item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[featuredPanel] [columnContainer bgcolor="#303030"] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Clean and Modern
The HOPE foundation theme sports a clean modern look with a stylish design and is built on the Responsive Bootstrap framework. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/columns" target="_blank"]View Columns[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Fully Customizable
We build our themes to be 100% customizable through the use of clever shortcodes, widgets and custom plug-ins. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/widgets" target="_blank"]View Widgets[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Theme Leaders
We are committed to quality, excellence and customer support. Learn more about us at PulsarMedia.ca [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="http://www.pulsarmedia.ca" target="_blank"]Learn More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [/featuredPanel] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of bootstrap configurations" link="/hope/columns" icon="fa fa-link"]Bootstrap Shortcodes[/panelHeader] Setup page layouts quick and easy with our built in bootstrap shortcodes. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of custom Widgets" link="/hope/widgets" icon="fa fa-cogs"]Custom Widgets[/panelHeader] Our premium themes come packed with many useful widgets right of the get-go. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="You can also add additional Google font styles." link="" icon="fa fa-google-plus"]Google Fonts[/panelHeader] Full Google Fonts library available. Select from over 600 fonts! Library updates automatically! [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="FontAwesome icons rock!" link="" icon="fa fa-thumbs-up-o"]FontAwesome Icons[/panelHeader] Over 361 icons available and ready to use. Add icons anywhere in your posts or pages. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"] [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" responsive="1" height="300" /] [/column] [column span="span6"]
Featured Video
Why Poverty? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. Suspendisse in turpis ipsum. Pellentesque scelerisque facilisis mattis. Morbi id mauris feugiat, consequat orci in, dictum orci. Mauris facilisis ante ultricies nisl ullamcorper, sed faucibus metus ullamcorper. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. [hopeButton type="small" textcolor="white" color="#0FB7C2" url="/hope/videos/"]Watch More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="93" /] [/column] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="104" /] [/column] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="107" /] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer fullscreen="on" bgimage="http://wp.microthemes.ca/hope/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/kids-bg.jpg"] [column span="span12"]   [callToAction]Create Clean Unique Layouts[/callToAction] Customize this modern theme any way you want with endless combinations of our powerful shortcodes. Our Premium themes are easy to work with! [hopeButton type="large" color="#ACDB05" url="/hope/panels/"]See More Features[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12" alignment="center"]
We need your help to reach our goal of $10,000. Help make a donation today!

item.title: Buttons
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] This page displays Button Shortcode examples. Button shortcodes accept the following parameters:
  • color - Available colors (blue, red, green, purple, orange, grey, brown, black, yellow, pink, teal)
  • textColor - Enter a hexadecimal value (ex. #FFFFFF)
  • type - Available types (small, medium, large)
  • url - Pass in a URL value (ex. "http://www.google.com")
  • target - Choose whether a button opens in a new window or not ("_blank" or "_self")
Note: parameters must be wrapped quotations. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12"]
Small Button
(hopeButton type="small" color="blue" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="blue" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="purple" textColor="white")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="purple" textColor="white"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="green" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="green" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="orange" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="orange" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="grey" textColor="white")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="grey" textColor="white"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="black" textColor="white")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="black" textColor="white"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="yellow" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="yellow" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="pink" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="pink" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="teal" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="teal" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton]
Medium Button
(hopeButton type="medium" color="red" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank")Medium Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="medium" color="red" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank"]Medium Button[/hopeButton]
Large Button
(hopeButton type="large" color="purple" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank")Large Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="large" color="purple" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank"]Large Button[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Videos
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] This page display's the Video Shortcodes available for this theme. You can insert Youtube or Vimeo videos anywhere inside posts, pages or widgets. The Youtube and Vimeo both accept the same following parameters:
  • id (supply a video id)
  • width
  • height
  • responsive (set to 1 to make the video responsive)
[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]YouTube (Fixed width)[/panelHeader] (youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" width="400" height="350")(/youtubeVideo) [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" width="400" height="350"][/youtubeVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]YouTube (Responsive)[/panelHeader] (youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" height="350" responsive="1")(/youtubeVideo) [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" height="350" responsive="1"][/youtubeVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]Vimeo (Fixed width)[/panelHeader] (vimeoVideo id="72625185" width="400" height="350")(/vimeoVideo) [vimeoVideo id="72625185" width="400" height="350"][/vimeoVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]Vimeo (Responsive)[/panelHeader] (vimeoVideo id="72625185" height="350" responsive="1")(/vimeoVideo) [vimeoVideo id="72625185" height="350" responsive="1"][/vimeoVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Alerts
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] This page displays Alert Shortcode examples. The alert shortcodes accepts the close parameter with a value of true or false. Passing in a value of false will prevent the alert box from being closed (see the Danger Box example below). [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-warning"]Danger Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="danger")This is an Alert Danger box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="danger"]This is an Alert Danger box.[/alert] [/column] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-info"]Info Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="info")This is an Info box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="info"]This is an Alert Info box.[/alert] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-thumbs-up"]Success Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="success")This is a Success box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="success"]This is an Alert Success box.[/alert] [/column] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-adn"]Alert Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="alert")This is an Alert box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="alert"]This is an Alert box.[/alert] [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Social Icons
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer] [column span="span12"] This page displays the Social Media Shortcode example. This shortcode accepts any FontAwesome icon value - see a list of available icons here. To add social icons simply create a socialGroup container first followed by any amount of socialIcon shortcodes. Here is a full list of parameters for the socialIcon shortcode:
  • icon
  • size
  • color
  • link
  • target
(socialGroup) (socialIcon icon="facebook" size="10" color="#3C599B" link="http://www.facebook.com" target="_self")(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="twitter" size="10" color="#32CCFE" link="http://www.twitter.com" target="_blank")(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="dribbble" size="10" color="#D95232" link="http://www.dribbble.com" )(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="tumblr" size="10" color="#1D87BD" link="http://www.tumblr.com" )(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="android" size="10" color="#009DF7" link="http://www.android.com" )(/socialIcon) (/socialGroup) [socialGroup] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-facebook" size="10" color="#3C599B" link="http://www.facebook.com" target="_self"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-twitter" size="10" color="#32CCFE" link="http://www.twitter.com" target="_blank"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-dribbble" size="10" color="#D95232" link="http://www.dribbble.com"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-tumblr" size="10" color="#1D87BD" link="http://www.tumblr.com"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-android" size="10" color="#009DF7" link="http://www.android.com"][/socialIcon] [/socialGroup] [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Widgets
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-twitter"]Twitter Widget[/panelHeader] Add a Twitter feed to sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-facebook"]Facebook Widget[/panelHeader] Add a Facebook Like box to sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-flickr"]Flickr Widget[/panelHeader] Add a live Flickr feed to sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]Video Widget[/panelHeader] Add popular Youtube, Vimeo or Dailymotion videos in sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-mail-reply"]Mailchimp Widget[/panelHeader] Add a MailChimp powered newsletter sign-up form in sidebar columns or footer columns. item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: [columnContainer] [column span="span12"] This premium WordPress themes comes with built-in help tabs in the administration system making it easy to copy and paste shortcodes on the fly. The Help tab can be located in the top right hand corner of the WordPress administration system. [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Custom Post Types
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer]
[column span="span4"]
[panelHeader icon="fa fa-calendar" link="/hope/events" tip="View the Events page"]Event System[/panelHeader]
Add and manage events through Events Custom Post Type. The events custom post type also comes equipped with a widget for easily adding events anywhere inside sidebars.
[/column]
[column span="span4"]
[panelHeader icon="fa fa-picture-o" link="/hope/gallery-page/children-aid-charity-event/" tip="View the Gallery page"]Gallery System[/panelHeader]
Add unlimited photo/video galleries through the Gallery Custom Post Type. Upload photos with thumbnails, add image captions and add Youtube videos.
[/column]
[column span="span4"]
[panelHeader icon="fa fa-user" link="/hope/organizers/" tip="View the Organizers page"]Organizers[/panelHeader]
Add organizer profiles quick and easy through the Organizer Custom Post Type. Each profile can be configured with personal and social information for easy access to contact information.
[/column]
[/columnContainer]

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[featuredPanel] [columnContainer bgcolor="#303030"] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Pulito e moderno
La fondazione tema HOPE sfoggia un look pulito e moderno, con un design elegante ed è costruito sul framework Bootstrap Responsive. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/columns" target="_blank"]View Columns[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Completamente personalizzabile
Costruiamo i nostri temi di essere al 100% personalizzabile attraverso l'uso di codici brevi intelligenti, widget e personalizzato plug-in. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/widgets" target="_blank"]View Widgets[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Leader a tema
Siamo impegnati a qualità, l'eccellenza e assistenza clienti. Scopri di più su noi PulsarMedia.ca [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="http://www.pulsarmedia.ca" target="_blank"]Learn More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [/featuredPanel] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of bootstrap configurations" link="/hope/columns" icon="icon-link"]Bootstrap Shortcodes[/panelHeader] Layout di pagina Installazione facile e veloce con il nostro costruito in codici brevi bootstrap. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of custom Widgets" link="/hope/widgets" icon="icon-cogs"]Custom Widgets[/panelHeader] I nostri temi premium sono confezionati con molti widget utili destra del get-go. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="You can also add additional Google font styles." link="" icon="icon-google-plus"]Google Fonts[/panelHeader] Pieno biblioteca Google Fonts disponibili. Scegli tra più di 600 caratteri! Aggiornamenti Biblioteca automaticamente! [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="FontAwesome icons rock!" link="" icon="icon-thumbs-up-alt"]FontAwesome Icons[/panelHeader] Oltre 361 icone disponibili e pronti per l'uso. Aggiungere icone ovunque nei tuoi post o pagine. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"] [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" responsive="1" height="300" /] [/column] [column span="span6"]

item.title: HOPE Wristbands
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: These stylish wristbands make a great gift idea for friends, family and loved ones. Show your support with friends and family with these awesome colorful wristbands - its one size fits all.
